scenes.background: (Monica) taps her pen impatiently. (Bob) sits down heavily, looking exasperated.
scenes.description: ‘We need a clear plan. What should we do next?’

options.text: Let's have a quick meeting to outline our priorities and actions.
options.analysis: You suggested a structured approach, showing high perception and empathy, but your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I think you should decide based on what you think is most urgent.
options.analysis: You delegated the decision-making, showing strong self-regulation but less empathy.

options.text: If this was planned better, we wouldn't be in this mess.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing low empathy and self-regulation, which might impact team dynamics negatively.
